Summary: a fire ball with flame pointing upward,moving in straight line,stopped,turned,sped off.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Penfield
There were no other sightings in Penfield on or around June 16th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my deck talking to a friend on the phone and I saw from the north east a flaming ball with flames shooting up from it and not behind it. It was traveling like and airplane speed but it was low. Then it went a short distance and stopped in the sky and the flame extinguished and it stayed as a fireball then. It turned to direct north started to go again quickly and stopped again and then took off in the same direction (north)towards lake Ontario and it was a white speck and I got a picture of it then but it was just a dot. I couldn't find my camera app quick enough to get a better photo of it bet it was very close to me to see very clearly and seemed to be in open sky and I can't figure out why no one else in the area didn't see it as it crossed a main highway rt 441 and then it turned into a tiny black dot and disappeared.
